Thea Frese Ekstrøm

Goals

I am always looking for new challenges where I can learn and grow, and I am ready to bring my creativity and attention to detail to your team.

My goal is to combine my technical knowledge with a creative approach to develop solutions that not only look good but also provide value to the users.

Through an internship, I aim to gain a deeper understanding of Figma prototyping and webdesign.

Skills and Qualifications

During my studies, I have developed skills in:

UI/UX design; where I have created wireframes and prototypes in Figma. We always worked with different user interfaces, focusing on user-friendly experiences and visual appeal.

Web design; particularly in the areas of optimization and user-friendliness.

Graphic design; in Adobe Illustrator, where I have created visual elements including logos and simple web graphics that help strengthen branding.

Additionally, I have worked with various tools

  • Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, Photoshop, XD, InDesign, etc.)
  • Figma (Design and FigJam)
  • HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Frameworks (Astro, Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js)

About Me

As a third-semester Multimedia Design student with a strong foundation in web design and UI/UX, I am passionate about creating intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences.

I have developed skills in Figma, Adobe Creative Cloud, and front-end development tools, and I’m eager to contribute to innovative projects that merge creativity and functionality. My ambition is to grow in a dynamic work environment where I can refine my skills and contribute to impactful design solutions.
